comments.body: Paging @jhtimmins -- need you permissions hat thoughts here :)

@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@RESOURCE_CONFIG = "Configurations"
RESOURCE_CONNECTION = "Connections"
RESOURCE_DAG_DEPENDENCIES = "DAG Dependencies"

comments.body: Might be a silly question, what's the difference between `can_read` and `can_show` ? Looks too similar, is it possible we can use `can_read` instead?

Actually there's no `can_read` for the RoleModelView. It's something that came with FAB.  Here's the list of permissions they have for RoleModelView: 
`can show on RoleModelView, can list on RoleModelView, can download on RoleModelView, can add on RoleModelView, can delete on RoleModelView, can edit on RoleModelView, copyrole on RoleModelView`.

I got these by looking at the permissions assigned to Admin role in airflow UI. Security>List Roles
aah .. so @jhtimmins mapped View-based permission to resource-based. James can you take a look a this and see if we should do the same for it (I might be wrong but want to make sure)?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +52,56 @@# Action Constants
ACTION_CAN_LIST = "can_list"
ACTION_CAN_SHOW = "can_show"
ACTION_CAN_CREATE = "can_create"
ACTION_CAN_READ = "can_read"
